content.html: One of things that frustrates me more in OSS is… folks asking when we will implement a feature for them. To all whom need to hear this: in community projects, this is unlikely to happen. Send a PR or find a way to fund that development.
content.value:
One of things that frustrates me more in OSS is… folks asking when we will implement a feature for them. 

To all whom need to hear this: in community projects, this is unlikely to happen. Send a PR or find a way to fund that development.
